caption: Lovely experience at the circus. The performances were great. The staff were really friendly. Perfect for kids, families and adults. Only thing was that you could purchase any drinks or food during the show.
Fantastic show start to finish, in a gorgeous theater!
Great atmosphere and location for the Paris 2024 squash open. Seats are really tight though so for long events it’s not comfortable.

The show is wonderful. Lots if different acts, very professional. We enjoyed the show to the maximum. Just remember you dont need to buy anything but the cheap tickets. It is much closer than you think, the place is small.

2 hours of activity, suitable for adults as well, Recommended to come early, to get a better sit. 20 min a break in the middle. Part of the show was conducted with animals. (Dogs and 1 horse) The show is very professional and well-organized.
A fantastic place to visit in Paris if you love the circus! It features animals, clowns, acrobats, and more. The building itself is also wonderfully authentic.

We stumbled across this circus while wandering around le marais and booked tickets for the following day and was so glad we did! This show exceeded our expectations in every way. All of the acts were amazing but what really sets it apart is the live band. The venue is also beautiful. We went to Moulin Rouge in the evening and we agreed that this circus was 10 times better! There is a quick intermission so you can stretch your legs - the seats are a little snug.

My first real circus and it turns out i have been spoiled by the first and oldest circus. Very enjoyable and entertaining. The narration is in French but the language of the circus doesn't need translation.

Absolutely amazing!!! A traditional circus with so much talent... we loved this...and especially on Christmas it made it so much more special.... Cheers to an extremely talented cast... it is a circus and live concert wrapped up in one show!! Best show for the $$

Nice spectacular with professional performance. The ring dance, balance on cycle which is around 9 meters high, funny comedy by the trio group, the live orchestra band and singing as well as interqcti9b with audience was simply amazing.
Went to this circus on our first trip to a Paris. It’s a must do! Amazing acts, music, atmosphere, and entertainment.
WOW..!! If there is just 1 circus you ever see, make it this one. Quite simply amazing and worth every penny. Some of the acts had us on the edge of our seats. What a great cast.

We saw the Bougline Circus with high level artists and animals (elephants horses, pigeons and a dog). Live orchestra and very entertaining for the whole family. Remember to take cash for popcorn and program. Lovely historical venue.
An excellent spectacle for everyone. If you like a great circus, you will enjoy this one.

This was an excellent show! Much better than I had anticipated. The acts are varied and the pace is broken down with a number of comic bits including a ball-fight with the audience that the kids were so thrilled with.  The acrobats and performers did a fantastic job.  There were only two aspects that took away from a perfect rating - the first was a mess up with allocating adjacent seats, which the system auto picked, but were inconvenient. If you are picking seats, the first three rows are the comfortable one. The hall is small and most seats have enough elevation for a good view, but there is nothing quite like being within touching distance of performers.  The second was a near admonish from a performer that we hadn't brought "cash for tips" - not that I saw him doing the same with any of the other locals. That was a little disappointing.
A must try yearly, specially with the childrens, the experience is magical for both adult and child audience !
Magical circus in the heart of Paris. Great selection of artists. Don’t miss this — all the excitement — and brilliant for a family outing.
Super spectacle ! J’adore

We attended the show as a family of 4 - my wife and I plus our son (7.5) and daughter (3). None of us speak a word of French but I had understood from other reviews that this was not an issue - I can say that is absolutely true. I would say that not speaking French even adds something to the experience as the brief moments where dialogue is used you can still comprehend anyway.  The show itself is simply spectacular - I had high hopes but it surpassed them easily. There is so much variety, so much entertainment and so much skill on display from the performers that you do not have a second to sit back - its edge of the seat stuff and I would urge everyone to go and see for themselves. During the interval there was some lovely snacks to purchase along with drinks and some mementos from the show - some of the performers were even there to have a chat to and sign the programs too.  This is one of the best things we've ever seen and we would return over and over when we go back to Paris.
What a beautiful afternoon!!! Very well prepared and timed spectacles. The selection of artists is great. Nice live music.

An amazing experience with world class circus professionals. Some wonderful time spent in a building commissioned by the emperor Napoleon III in 1852 to make it the most beautiful circus in the world!

The show is great, please don't get me wrong. Amazing numbers, great live music, I was really impressed. 5 stars for the show.  But the place is so small and confusing. So uncomfortable. And I really don't get it why we need to wait on line for 30 minutes to be seated in the wrong place! 1 star for the infrastructure and organization.  I'd like to give 3.5 stars because the show is more important, but the experience as a whole didn't deserve 4.
Sublime!! Second time here and will always visit when I’m in Paris.

It is our third time on 3 years on the row with our two small kids. Still every time a Fantastique and Original Show. Our kids enjoy every time. I found a very good way to pass a different sunday with Family.
Fabulous show you don’t wanna miss !!
True talents show. Near perfect performances. Dazzling presentation. An all-time favorite memory.
Very nice and brings ur inner child Alive
Great family show in an superb environment ! A must to do in Paris.. and make sure you go for something during the break.
Fun experience, for children under 5 the second half feels lengthy and they got abit bored ;But amazing talents overall

One of the classic circus in France, must see. Great for kids, good enough for adults also. Great atmosphere, live music band, beautiful roof and decoration. Seats are very narrow, hard for tall people to put their knees, but building is more than 100 years old so that’s understandable.
Love Circus shows yet like it snug and comfy? This is the place for you 🏠🤗 Currently showing "Dingue" with world renowned Bouglione circus family. …
Great place also for events like graduations!

It was amazing! I love it a lot! The artists were incredible. I really had an amazing time. This circus has a little show with horses and maybe is not good to still have circus with animals but the animals seem to be very well cared for by the circus.  I highly recommend coming.
A lot of fun for us. Even at 12 and 14 the kids had fun

Visited on the 25/10/22  This a spectacular show  with such a variety of performances presented by the ringmaster and Professional artists in beautiful costumes .The venue  is incredible and in my opinion belongs up there with the moulin rouge Eiffel Tower  as a must visit attraction . 2 hours of great delight with excellent facilities drinks food. The toilets are  In excellent clean condition .

We only got to enjoy the first half show. My 2 year daughter got hurt really bad on the way back to the stadium from bathroom. I am sure the couple employees by the door saw my daughter walking towards me, one employee with short gray hair with glasses on just walked directly towards my daughter, which caused my baby fell forward. We left with Two chipped front teeth with swollen lips on her without finishing the show. It was so traumatic for all of us. Even though there was a doctor who checked her, the fact that my daughter is injured doesn’t go away. And the injury would most likely affect her permanent teeth according to the dentist. If you are actually charging for kids 2 years up, there should be more child proof and all the employees need to be alert and aware. I emailed them yesterday but no response. Edit: it’s been over a week, no response whatsoever. Very disappointing. Will not recommend to anyone!

Beautiful show, impressive acrobat skills and professionality in all aspects.  Ridiculously low prices for what you get. Also nice to see the building has still a warm authenticity . Must see in Paris.
Awesome show. Went with 2 friends, we all enjoyed it. Amazing mix of dance and circus. As good as, or even better than last year. Great entertainment.
